item.title: Farmers Bank
item.dc:creator: nancy@groupcj.com
item.description: Farmers Bank in Frankfort felt its image got a bit stodgy and old fashioned. Our agency developed a fresh approach to television and print, attracting new customers to the established bank.
item.content:encoded: Farmers Bank in Frankfort felt its image got a bit stodgy and old fashioned. Our agency developed a fresh approach to television and print, attracting new customers to the established bank.

item.title: United Bank
item.dc:creator: nancy@groupcj.com
item.description: As three sister banks merged, there was concern about losing customers resistant to change. The solution? United Bank become the brand new bank you’ve known for years. By using a combination of recognizable photos of the bank personnel, a new identity and slogan, the new bank brand was unveiled in a fresh, bold manner. [mejsvideo src="/wp-content/uploads/2013/10/UBSamePeople.mp4" width="348" height="288"]
item.content:encoded:
As three sister banks merged, there was concern about losing customers resistant to change. The solution? United Bank become the brand new bank you’ve known for years. By using a combination of recognizable photos of the bank personnel, a new identity and slogan, the new bank brand was unveiled in a fresh, bold manner.

[mejsvideo src="/wp-content/uploads/2013/10/UBSamePeople.mp4" width="348" height="288"]
